attributes.action: Protect staffies usually the owners are to blame
attributes.additional_details: Due to recent sightings of posst on social media stating these dogs are violent murderous animals i believe we need to protect them as theyre not to blame 99% of the time the owner is I have known pelnty of staffordshire bull terriers that are beautiful loving dogs very family orientated after a seeing a petition to get them added to the dangerous dog act 1991 I am going to stand to protect them.
attributes.background: I want action because people believe these animals are monsters they are not usually its down to bad owners they need protection
